title: PSA: GGMF profile icon not giving the animated profile background IS a bug, and is being worked on

embed.description: @moobeat There's a bug currently where the GGMF portrait icon isn't giving the background - working to fix that right now!

body: I feel like an announcer with these PSA posts... {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
